title: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: Bug 14197: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
OB: After creating a working set with one project and selecting it, the package view is filtered.
EB: The package view should not be filtered immediately upon removing a working set.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it.
2. Observe that the package view is filtered.

Expected result:
1. Open the working set dialog again.
2. Create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
